results.definition: having a low center of gravity; built low to the ground
the act of assuming or maintaining a crouching position with the knees bent and the buttocks near the heels

examples: In some cultures, the women give birth while squatting

results.definition: exercising by repeatedly assuming a crouching position with the knees bent; strengthens the leg muscles
short and thick; as e.g. having short legs and heavy musculature
examples: a little church with a squat tower

results.definition: be close to the earth, or be disproportionately wide
